titles.title: World Trade Organization resolution
WTO Withdrawal resolution
Withdrawing the approval of the United States from the Agreement establishing the World Trade Organization.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported Adversely by the Yeas and Nays: 35 - 0.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Reported adversely by the Committee on Ways and Means. H. Rept. 106-672.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 376.

action.text: Rules Committee Resolution H. Res. 528 Reported to House. Rule provides for consideration of H.J. Res. 90 with 2 hours of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions. Measure will be considered read. Bill is closed to amendments.
Considered under the provisions of rule H. Res. 528.

Rule provides for consideration of H.J. Res. 90 with 2 hours of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions. Measure will be considered read. Bill is closed to amendments.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with two hours of debate on H.J. Res. 90.
The previous question was ordered pursuant to the rule.

POSTPONED PROCEEDINGS - The Chair put the question on agreeing to H.J. Res. 90 and announced that the noes had prevailed. Mr. Paul objected to the voice vote and demanded the yeas-and-nays. The Chair postponed further proceedigns until later in the legislative day.

vote.text: On passage Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 56 - 363, 3 Present (Roll no. 310).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 6/12/2000--Reported to House amended. Withdraws U.S. approval of the World Trade Organization Agreement.
